Name: Microsoft Purview Information Protection
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description: The [Microsoft Information Protection](https://learn.microsoft.com/microsoft-365/compliance/information-protection) Solution for Microsoft Sentinel integrates Microsoft Purview Information Protection logs for security monitoring in Microsoft Sentinel. Customers can stream auditing events generated from Microsoft Purview Information Protection unified labeling clients and scanners and emitted to M365 audit log for central reporting in Sentinel.
